I denna rekryteringsprocess kommer vi utöver dom tekniska kraven också lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och intresse för tjänsten. Som person är du kommunikativ, driven och har lätt att samarbeta med andra.


Denna tjänst är säkerhetsklassad, vilket innebär att du kommer behöva genomgå och bli godkänd i en säkerhetsprövning för att kunna bli anställd.


Övrigt

Lön: Fast månadslön

Omfattning: Heltid, tillsvidare

Start: Omgående med hänsyn till uppsägningstid

Placeringsort: Stockholm, möjlighet till hemarbete 2 dagar i veckan.

Vi behandlar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan ansökningstiden har gått ut, skicka din ansökan redan idag!


Om oss

Procruitment är Sveriges enda karriärbyrå inom IT, tech och engineering som genom proaktiv rekrytering förenar attraktiva arbetsgivare med människor som delar samma mål och ambitioner. Oavsett om du är en erfaren ledare eller om du ska ta ditt första steg ut i karriären hjälper vi dig att nå dina karriärmål - samtidigt som vi bryr oss om dig, din resa och att du mår bra längs vägen.


Procruitment är stolta vinnare av Recruitment Awards och är utsedda till Årets Rekryteringsföretag och Årets Raket samt Gasellföretag 2024 av Dagens Industri.

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
At Umain, we're not just creating software; we're crafting the future, one innovative project at a time. With our motto "Shape, Ship, Scale," we empower our team to not only envision the future but also play a pivotal role in building it. We're a dynamic team where you can shape the future, ship groundbreaking solutions, and scale your abilities in many different ways.

We're on the lookout for developers ready to join us in this journey, bringing passion, creativity, and dedication along with them. The role is ideal for engineers with demonstrable skills in AI as well as for software engineers who have recently transitioned to AI and ML expertise, and offers an opportunity to develop your craft whilst working closely with clients on delivering AI solutions to real-world challenges.

Job Summary

We are seeking an AI Engineer with a strong intuition for AI and a genuine enthusiasm in building robust, scalable solutions to power innovative digital experiences. The ideal candidate combines technical expertise with a deep enthusiasm for advancing AI capabilities.

What We Offer


A chance to work closely with global brands on a range of diverse and unique projects that explore and truly push the boundaries of what's possible.
A fun and fair work environment where you have the opportunity to expand your skills through unique challenges and fantastic colleagues.
A personal coach, and a setting where you can grow professionally and personally.
Being part of multidisciplinary teams, participating in agile teams, being an important player in a highly ambitious setting.


As an AI Engineer at Umain, your role will involve:


Assisting our clients in clarifying their questions and determining if using AI is a suitable solution for them
You understand the limitations of a model and how to address them within the product’s UX
Implementing AI-as-a-Service (e.g., OpenAI, Claude LLMs) in projects; you assess when these services are a good option and understand any potential limitations
Being familiar with pre-trained models and available datasets and the ability to apply them if existing AI services fall short for the use case at hand
Validating, deploying, monitoring, and maintaining built models, ensuring they can be used at scale
Developing and maintaining end-to-end data pipelines and machine learning workflows, optimizing for performance and reliability
Working with diverse, cross-functional teams on projects that deliver groundbreaking AI solutions for global brands


It’s a plus (not a requirement) if you have additional experience in:


PyTorch, Tensorflow
Transfer learning, few-shot learning, PEFT and LoRa
Multi-modal transformer models, RLHF


Who You Are

We Value Candidates Who Demonstrate


Great delivery skills: Proven capability to deliver AI solutions
Strong AI intuition: A deep understanding of AI concepts
Curiosity: Enthusiasm for emerging technologies, creativity in problem-solving, and an eagerness to learn in a rapidly evolving AI landscape
You're a developer with a passion for innovation and a knack for problem-solving.
You're eager to learn, grow, and take on new challenges.
You value collaboration, diversity, and the opportunity to make a significant impact.
You believe in the power of technology to shape the future.


Why Umain?

Career Framework: We believe in fairness and clarity, which is why we've established a transparent career framework to ensure equal pay and equal opportunities for all. Your growth and success are as important to us as they are to you. Together with your coach, you will build your own development plan and grow in your career.

Work-Life Balance: At Umain, diversity is our strength. We understand that life doesn’t pause when you walk into the office. That's why we've cultivated an environment that supports an excellent work-life balance. We welcome team members from all walks of life, recognizing the richness that different backgrounds, ages, and life stages bring to our team. We're committed to supporting each other, encouraging a healthy work-life balance that respects your needs, whether it's taking care of your family, your pets, or yourself.

Innovations and Learning: Technology is always evolving, bringing new challenges and opportunities for collaboration and learning. Our developers work closely with designers, analysts, testers and more to tackle these challenges head-on, sharing knowledge and growing together.

Skills Over Degrees: We’re more interested in what you can do than in the diplomas you hold. Talent, drive, and creativity are what count at Umain. Here, you’ll find opportunities to grow, learn, and excel in your career, regardless of your educational background. If you have the ambition and commitment to succeed, we have the environment and resources to support your journey.

Are you ready to SHAPE, SHIP, and SCALE with us?

If you're a developer who thrives on innovation, values a supportive and inclusive workplace, and is eager to make a tangible impact on the future, we’d love to hear from you. Let’s build something awesome together.

Umain is a digital product consultancy. We shape, ship and scale digital products at speed. Founded in Stockholm in 2001, we are a growing team of 100+ experts in digital product strategy, design, and technology.

We are a part of Eidra, a group of top-notch companies specializing in strategy, creativity, and engineering. As a collective we guide leaders in making meaningful and lasting change.
Show more

Title: Data Scientist in Husqvarna Groups new AI org!
Description:
Imagine a place where your passion for technology meets the thrill of innovation. Picture yourself as part of a dynamic team, driving tangible business impact - through innovative AI solutions. Welcome to our world!

About this opportunity:

This is a chance to be part of a team that's passionate about building something meaningful. The thrill of working on research projects that push the boundaries of technology, a collaborative environment where your ideas are valued and your contributions make a real impact. The opportunity to proactively drive the agenda - and shape the future of AI.

Here, we are a close-knit team of people working in data, AI and cloud, with colleagues both in India and in Sweden. Our mission? To scale AI - and pioneer forward-leading technology, ensuring we stay ahead of the curve and deliver impactful solutions.

You will:

As a Data Scientist, you'll be at the heart of our innovation. You'll dive into data, build models, fine-tune algorithms, and deploy solutions in cloud environments. You'll collaborate with data architects, cloud experts, software developers and other IT specialists, weaving together your expertise - to create something extraordinary.


Develop and deliver AI solutions, including data pre-processing, analysis, modelling, deployment, and maintenance.
Design, install, test, and maintain data management systems, to meet business requirements.
Implement scripts for database maintenance, deployment, and ETL operations.
Manage cloud services (AWS, Azure) and relevant cloud storage systems.
Monitor data performance and modify infrastructure, to improve pipelines and models.
Document feature lists, user stories, and roadmaps aligned with the product vision.
Stay updated with technology trends in data science, data engineering, and AI.
Execute academic and research projects relevant to the AI organization.
Support ideation processes with technical and entrepreneurial expertise.
Identify business opportunities through technology-driven innovation.
Participate in knowledge-sharing activities, to elevate company expertise in AI.



Who We're Looking For:

A great communicator - in the realm of technology. Maybe you’ve started your journey in software development - and found your way into the world of AI. Maybe you've worked in startups (or another innovative environment), where you didn't just code - you pitched ideas, drove innovation, and created solutions that made a difference. In any environment, you see opportunity in uncertainty, and you like to challenge yourself to learn new areas.

Your craftsmanship in writing exceptional code and delivery of high-quality products are your strengths. You're not just a coder; you are also a team-player, a communicator, an innovator, a social person - who knows how to communicate complex concepts effectively to non-technical stakeholders.

At Husqvarna, we strive to have a work environment that is inclusive and diverse, where we believe that our differences are our strengths. Therefore, our winning culture is very important to us, which is why we go by the beliefs: We are Bold, We are Dedicated and We Care.

Your Skills and Qualifications:


A degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field and at least 5 years of experience in developing and delivering data and AI solutions, as a Data Scientist, Data Engineer, Software Developer, or similar role. Knowledge of Python, SQL
Familiarity with big data technologies, like Spark.
Experience leading and collaborating on cross-functional projects.
Experience with developing prescriptive solutions to support decision making and experimentation.



Location:

Location for this position is in Sweden at one of our offices in Stockholm, Huskvarna, or Jonsered (outside Gothenburg).

But, with our hybrid working environment, you'll have the flexibility to work both onsite and remotely, promoting work-life balance for all team members. We meet in the office at least 2-3 days a week (50%).

Your application:

If this sounds like the adventure you’ve been waiting for, we want to hear from you! Apply as soon as possible but no later than 2025-05-30. We apply ongoing selection.

For questions regarding the process, please contact Global Talent Acquisition Partner, Matilda Nordén matilda.norden@husqvarnagroup.com. 

About Husqvarna:

Husqvarna Group is a global leader in innovative solutions for managing forests, parks, and gardens, as well as cutting equipment and diamond tools for the light construction and stone industries. With an innovative mindset, we are dedicated to deliver high-quality solutions ranging from robotic mowers to chainsaws, watering systems and power cutters, with a strong focus on our customers and future generations.

Founded in the Swedish town Huskvarna in 1689, we have been pioneers in our business for more than three centuries. Today, we are mainly operating under the Husqvarna and Gardena brands, serving consumers and professionals in over 100 countries through direct sales, dealers, and retailers. Headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden, Husqvarna Group employs approximately 13,300 people in 40 countries and reported net sales of SEK 48,4 billion in 2024. Husqvarna Group is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm.

Last date to apply:

30 May 2025

Title: Founding Data Scientist / Engineer
Description:
About the Company

Zoometry is an AgTech startup on a mission to accelerate innovation in animal feed through data. We are developing the first end-to-end SaaS platform that centralizes, simplifies, and analyzes data from animal nutrition and health trials. Our north star is to empower our customers to develop more effective and sustainable health solutions, faster.




About the Role

As our Founding Data Scientist / Engineer (and our very first hire! 🙂), you will work directly with the founder on a wide range of topics to build Zoometry's foundations and execute our strategy. You will be at the heart of creating our platform and our data culture.




This will include

Building and managing Zoometry's data infrastructure (pipelines, databases, cloud)
Developing and implementing analyses and models (statistical, ML) to extract valuable insights from trial data
Organizing how we work with data (processes, technology choices, best practices)
Contributing to the product vision by bringing a data perspective
Transforming raw data into actionable value for our users via the platform
Collaborating closely with the founder on data and product strategy
And much more... (it's the startup adventure!)




Qualifications

First and foremost, you believe that technology and data can transform traditional industries like animal nutrition, and you are passionate about contributing to more effective and sustainable animal feed. This pivotal role within an early-stage startup is perfect for a Data Engineer with an entrepreneurial spirit who wants to make a major impact. You will enjoy this role if you are a fast thinker, thrive in ambiguity and rapid change, and enjoy pushing the boundaries of your comfort zone.




You will also need to

Have solid technical expertise in Data Engineering and interest in Data Science (Python/R, SQL, Cloud platforms, ETL, Stats/ML)
Possess a solution-oriented, autonomous, and proactive mindset
Have a strong interest in the animal nutrition/health or AgTech domain – this would be a fantastic plus
Embrace a positive, growth-oriented mindset ("infinite mindset")




Logistics & Diversity

The role can be based in Stockholm or remote (with a preference for France). We strongly believe that diverse teams perform better, so we would be thrilled if you bring a unique perspective that broadens ours




How to apply

Please send your CV and a cover letter explaining your interest in Zoometry and why you believe you are the ideal candidate for this founding role to zoometry.tech@gmail.com Highlight your relevant experience in Data Engineering and Data Science, your entrepreneurial spirit, and ideally, your interest in our industry.

Show more

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
B3 Link, som är en del av B3-koncernen, är bland annat unika genom vår expertis inom AI-tillämpningar och förmåga att leverera projekt till våra kunder. Vi kombinerar teknik och affärsbehov, och tar ansvar för hela projektcykeln – från business case till implementering av AI-lösningar.

Om rollen

Nu söker vi dig som har erfarenhet inom maskininlärning! Att vara anställd på B3 Link innebär att du hjälper våra kunder i deras utvecklingsprojekt och dagliga utmaningar. Vi ser gärna att du har vana att arbeta såväl självständigt som kundnära och är van vid ett agilt teambaserat arbetssätt.

Vi letar efter dig som har:


Minst 5 års dokumenterad arbetserfarenhet inom maskininlärning eller liknande område
Erfarenhet av att utveckla och implementera maskininlärningsmodeller
Gedigen erfarenhet inom minst ett programmeringsspråk (te.x. Python, Scala eller R)
Erfarenhet av SQL och databashantering
Erfarenhet av dataanalys- och visualiseringsverktyg så som Pandas, Matplotlib
Kunskap om maskininlärningsbibliotek som TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn
Behärskar god svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


Vad vi erbjuder:

Att vi trivs tillsammans på B3 Link är otroligt viktigt. Anledningen till att många börjar hos oss är bland annat det stora fokuset på kompetensutveckling, där vi kontinuerligt delar kunskap med varandra och uppmuntrar till kompetensutveckling och certifieringar. Vi erbjuder bland annat:


Generös kompetensutveckling
Attraktiv lönemodell
En fantastisk wellness- och medarbetarsatsning


Om B3

B3 Link är en del av B3-koncernen. B3 är en börsnoterad koncern och trygg arbetsgivare med hög medarbetarnöjdhet. B3 har ca 1000 medarbetare inom många olika expertområden. B3 är rankad som Sveriges tredje bästa arbetsplats 2021 av Great Place to Work, utsett till Sveriges IT Karriärföretag 2022 och 2023, samt vann utmärkelsen Årets Karriärföretag 2022. Vi lever efter våra värdeord erfarenhet, olikheter och energi samt satsar på hållbarhet i alla led. Vi tror att medarbetare som mår bra presterar bättre och har därför B3 Team som anordnar aktiviteter inom wellness, från yoga och löpning till musikquiz och föreläsningar om stresshantering och mental hälsa.

Varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag!

Har du frågor om tjänsten? Tveka inte att kontakta rekryteringsansvarig, Lidia, för denna tjänst på lidia.hagos@b3.se.
Show more

Varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag!

Har du frågor om tjänsten? Tveka inte att kontakta rekryteringsansvarig, Lidia, för denna tjänst på lidia.hagos@b3.se.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer & Data Engineer
Description:
Drivs du av att arbeta med data och utveckla lösningar som gör verklig skillnad? Hos Amendo Tech får du chansen att arbeta i framkant inom machine learning och data engineering för några av Sveriges mest spännande företag. Just nu söker vi drivna och lösningsorienterade specialister för kommande uppdrag inom bank och finans, detaljhandel, myndigheter, produktbolag och snabbväxande startups. Vi erbjuder unika möjligheter för dig som är redo för en ny, stimulerande utmaning.

Din kompetens & profil

Machine Learning Engineer

Vi söker dig som har gedigen erfarenhet av att bygga och implementera maskininlärningsmodeller och som trivs med att analysera stora mängder data för att skapa insikter och affärsvärde.

Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av ett eller flera av följande områden/verktyg:


Programmering: Stark kompetens inom Python, Java eller Scala.
ML-ramverk: Erfarenhet av verktyg som TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn eller Keras.
Modellutveckling: Kompetens inom modellträning, optimering och hyperparameter-tuning.
Prediktiv modellering: Erfarenhet av regression, klassificering, klustring och djupinlärning.
Databehandling: Vana vid dataförbehandling och analys, gärna med verktyg som Pandas, NumPy och Dask.
Molntjänster: Erfarenhet av ML-pipelines på AWS SageMaker, Azure ML eller Google Cloud AI.
MLOps: Erfarenhet av CI/CD-principer för ML och verktyg som MLflow, Kubeflow, eller TensorFlow Extended (TFX).
Analytisk förmåga: Förmåga att tolka och kommunicera resultat till både tekniska och icke-tekniska intressenter



Data Engineer

Vi söker även dig som är erfaren inom data engineering och kan bygga skalbara dataplattformar, pipelines och integrationer som möjliggör analys och avancerad datamodellering.

Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av ett eller flera av följande områden/verktyg:


Programmering och scripting: Erfarenhet av Python, Java, Scala, eller SQL.
Dataplattformar och pipelines: Kunskap om verktyg som Apache Spark, Apache Kafka, Airflow, eller DBT.
Molntjänster: Erfarenhet av att bygga och hantera dataflöden i molnmiljöer som AWS (Glue, Redshift), Azure (Data Factory, Synapse) eller Google Cloud (BigQuery, Dataflow).
Data Lakes och Data Warehouses: Erfarenhet av att arbeta med dataarkitektur och lagringslösningar för att hantera stora datamängder.
ETL/ELT-processer: Erfarenhet av att utveckla effektiva och robusta ETL/ELT-pipelines.
Big Data-ramverk: Kunskap inom hantering och bearbetning av stora datamängder med exempelvis Hadoop, Hive, eller Snowflake.
Versionshantering och samarbete: God förståelse för versionshantering i Git och vana att arbeta i agila team.
Data Governance och säkerhet: Förståelse för datahanteringsprinciper, GDPR och dataetik.



Du har en vilja, nyfikenhet och drivkraft att vilja skapa nytta hos kunden samt lära dig nytt. En problemlösare som inte är rädd för att ta initiativ och vågar utforska nya vägar och arbetssätt. Du har en förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i nya sammanhang och processer. Du får saker gjorda och ser kunskapsluckor som en möjlighet för personlig utveckling. Du är analytisk och har stor förståelse för vikten av service och kommunikation.

Som konsult kommer du att ställas inför en rad olika utmaningar, både från ett socialt och pragmatiskt perspektiv. Därför tror vi att du är öppen och ödmjuk för både förändring och för olikheter. Du har ett agilt sätt att möta problem och kan se dem från olika vinklar.

Om Amendo Tech

Amendo Tech är din heltäckande partner inom IT och tech. Som vår konsultkollega blir du en del av ett personligt bolag som lägger stor vikt vid kompetens, mångfald och innovation. Vi ser varje medarbetares unika perspektiv som en styrka, och vi erbjuder ett öppet klimat där vi stöttar dig att nå dina mål. Tillsammans bidrar vi till att forma en bättre framtid genom teknik och kreativitet.

Vi är ett expansivt bolag med stark lokal närvaro i Stockholm samt i sydvästra och norra Sverige. Följ Amendo Tech på Linkedin!

Amendo Tech är en del av Amendo Group som har arbetat med framtidens kompetens sedan 2001. I koncernen ingår även Amendo Bemanning & Rekrytering och Lagotto Executive Search & Interim. Tillsammans möter vi dig där du står, och tar dig dit du vill. Vi är din engagerade och trygga kompetenspartner.

Frågor och kontakt

Vid frågor eller funderingar om våra konsultuppdrag är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till Amendo Techs Kiara Bergqvist på kiara.bergqvist@amendotech.se eller Johanna Hallenberg på johanna.hallenberg@amendotech.se. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig, varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

Title: Senior AI / ML Engineer
Description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

Jobbeskrivning


Designa, utveckla och produktionssätta skalbara AI/ML-modeller för att möta produktens affärsmål.
Samarbeta med produkt-, ingenjörs- och datateam för att integrera AI-teknologier i produkterna.
Designa och underhålla AI/ML-pipelines och optimerad infrastruktur, med särskilt fokus på Azure.


Din profil (Skall krav)


Flerårig erfarenhet av AI/ML-utveckling och att sätta upp och produktionssätta lösningar i en produktionsmiljö.
Hög kompetens i Python och erfarenhet av att arbeta i molnmiljöer, särskilt Azure.
Gedigen erfarenhet av containerteknologier
Erfarenhet från produktbolag är ett krav.
Förmåga att samarbeta i tvärfunktionella team och arbeta i miljöer med snabba förändringar.
Kompetens inom MLOps, verktyg som Databricks och molnoperationer med Terraform.


Meriterande


Tidigare erfarenhet av co-pilot-projekt, särskilt i mindre och snabbrörliga organisationer.
Erfarenhet från finanssektorn.
Kunskap inom computer vision och arbete med visuellt rika dokument (VRDs).
Erfarenhet av AI-ramverk som PyTorch.
Kompetens inom MLOps, verktyg som Databricks och molnoperationer med Terraform.
Erfarenhet av generativ AI, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), och utveckling av API-drivna mikrotjänster.


Sista ansökningdatum: 02-05-2025

Om Deploja

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!

🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.

🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.

🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.

💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.

🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?

🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.

🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?


Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

Title: Senior Data Scientist (Analytics), Consumer, Ads
Description:
About Wolt

At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.

Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.

About Ads Analytics At Wolt

As the name Ads Analytics implies, this team aims to provide reliable data insights that drive informed decision-making, empower Wolt's product organisation, and foster a data-driven culture through collaboration and education.

About The Ads Domain

The AdTech team is a team that owns the end-to-end experience of advertising at Wolt. They build tools for merchants and brands that can offer visibility and increased performance. Their long-term goal is to create a unified Wolt + DoorDash advertising platform that will benefit both global and local clients.

About The Role

As a Data Scientist at Wolt, your role involves diving into our data to solve crucial business problems. The scope of this role ranges from diagnosing problem areas to identifying solutions to designing experiments and ultimately influencing decision-making. This is a rare, operational, and actionable data-driven experience. When you join this team, you will be driving action from the frontlines, rather than just doing yet another analytics role.

If you enjoy finding patterns amidst chaos, are excited to build from 0 to 1, and have experience using analytics to affect Marketing or AdTech, we're looking for someone like you.

Our offering to you


The online delivery platform that Wolt is building will offer you interesting and complex challenges together with the opportunities to create a big impact with your skills. Lots of geolocational and temporal data in real-time combined with differences in the economics and dynamics of the cities we operate in make Wolt both a challenging and so interesting company to practice analytics.
You can choose the location from our tech hubs Helsinki, Stockholm and Tallinn, or you can work entirely remotely anywhere in Finland, Sweden and Estonia. You have the chance to decide the ways of working — a hybrid, at the office, or remote within the location above. 💙 Read more about our remote setup.
You would get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, we think big but stay humble, do right by people, we treat others kindly and justly, recognize that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement. Read more about how we work.


Our humble expectations


Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
5+ years of experience in a Data Analyst or Data Scientist position.
Experience with the Ads domain - as a huge plus.
Expertise in statistical analysis, including hypothesis testing (A/B testing), experimentation using statistical software packages in Python, R, or equivalent.
Proficiency in writing structured and efficient SQL queries for large data sets.
Have prior experience building intuitive data visualizations and dashboards that influence business decisions, utilizing tools like Tableau, Mixpanel, Looker, or similar.


Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion

We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

Read more about how we work.


Our humble expectations


Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
5+ years of experience in a Data Analyst or Data Scientist position.
Experience with the Payments domain - we’ll pay lots of attention to this experience.
Expertise in statistical analysis, including hypothesis testing (A/B testing), and experimentation using statistical software packages in Python, R, or equivalent.
Proficiency in writing structured and efficient SQL queries for large data sets.
Have prior experience building intuitive data visualizations and dashboards that influence business decisions, utilizing tools like Tableau, Mixpanel, Looker, or similar.


Next steps

The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!

The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.

For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Zhanna Filintseva (zhanna.filintseva@wolt.com)

Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion

We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.
Show more
HTML:
About Wolt

At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.

Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.

About Consumer Analytics At Wolt

As the name Consumer Analytics implies, this team aims to provide reliable data insights that drive informed decision-making, empower Wolt's product organization, and foster a data-driven culture through collaboration and education, ultimately inspiring teams and building value for the Consumer group.

About The Payments Domain

Payment Group at Wolt is building a world-class payment infrastructure for the best customer experience. You’ll be part of the team working on a smooth, scalable, and secure checkout experience adapting to the many use cases of consumers.

About The Role

As a Data Scientist at Wolt, your role involves diving into our data to solve crucial business problems. The scope of this role ranges from diagnosing problem areas to identifying solutions to designing experiments and ultimately influencing decision-making. This is a rare, operational, and actionable data-driven experience. When you join this team, you will be driving action from the frontlines, rather than just doing yet another analytics role.

If you enjoy finding patterns amidst chaos, are excited to build from 0 to 1, and have experience using analytics to affect Payments, we're looking for someone like you!

Our offering to you

  • The online delivery platform that Wolt is building will offer you interesting and complex challenges together with the opportunities to create a big impact with your skills. Lots of geolocational and temporal data in real-time combined with differences in the economics and dynamics of the cities we operate in make Wolt both a challenging and so interesting company to practice analytics.
  • You can choose the location from our tech hubs Helsinki, Berlin and Stockholm, or you can work entirely remotely anywhere in Finland, Germany, Sweden and Estonia. You have the chance to decide the ways of working — a hybrid, at the office, or remote within the location above. 💙 Read more about our remote setup.
  • You would get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, we think big but stay humble, do right by people, we treat others kindly and justly, recognize that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement. Read more about how we work.

Our humble expectations

  • Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
  • 5+ years of experience in a Data Analyst or Data Scientist position.
  • Experience with the Payments domain - we’ll pay lots of attention to this experience.
  • Expertise in statistical analysis, including hypothesis testing (A/B testing), and experimentation using statistical software packages in Python, R, or equivalent.
  • Proficiency in writing structured and efficient SQL queries for large data sets.
  • Have prior experience building intuitive data visualizations and dashboards that influence business decisions, utilizing tools like Tableau, Mixpanel, Looker, or similar.

Next steps

The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!

The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.

For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Zhanna Filintseva (zhanna.filintseva@wolt.com)

Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion

We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

Title: Graduate Program - Innovation Impact -R&D Data Scientist Chemistry (d/f/m)
Description:
About the Innovation Impact Program Our 18-month Graduate Program starts on October 1st, 2025, at our Henkel Adhesive Technologies Innovation Center in Düsseldorf. You will be part of an exciting development journey, where you will receive a permanent contract from day one, relocation support, and hands-on experience across various innovative technologies. Upon completion, you will have the opportunity to transition into global roles within Henkel’s innovation network.

What You´ll Do


Partner with product developers and application engineers as part of our R&D team in Düsseldorf, Germany to understand technologies, data collection processes, and challenges driving the digital transformation within R&D
Design and conduct data analysis projects to identify trends and patterns in formulation data sets, and build and deploy machine learning models to predict formulation performance, stability, and quality
Collaborate closely with R&D colleagues to translate data insights into new formulations, product development decisions, and application processes - optimizing R&D workflows
Develop and maintain data visualization dashboards to effectively communicate insights to technical and business stakeholders
Leverage your digital skillset to drive awareness and application of data-based decision-making and digital tools across R&D
Support the digital transformation of R&D by implementing data-driven workflows for process development and knowledge management


What makes you a good fit


You have recently completed, or are about to complete, a Master’s or Ph.D. that combines a strong foundation in Chemistry, Engineering, or Materials Science with Data Science, Physics, Computer Science, or a related analytical field—for example, a Bachelor’s in a natural science and a digitally focused Master's, or interdisciplinary studies that enable you to understand both lab-based R&D and data-driven approaches
You bring first hands-on experience with data analysis and modeling in scientific or engineering contexts, and have a strong grasp of statistical methods and machine learning algorithms (e.g., regression, classification)
You are proficient in data tools such as Python or R, DoE software like Minitab or JMP, and data visualization platforms (e.g., Excel, Power BI, Tableau); experience with IoT, finite element analysis (FEA), and computational fluid dynamics (CFD) is a plus
You are interested in working in a laboratory environment, motivated to learn about formulations, product development, and R&D workflows, and keen to apply your skills in a hands-on setting
You enjoy collaborating with non-digital colleagues, and can confidently explain digital tools and data concepts in a simple, practical way to support their daily work
You are interested in growing your career in Henkel’s global Innovation network, with relocation as one possible path after the program.
Proficiency in English is essential, as you will work in an international environment


Ready to take the next step in your career? Visit our program landing page for full details and apply today.

Some perks of joining Henkel

At Henkel, we come from a broad range of backgrounds, perspectives, and life experiences. We believe the uniqueness of all our employees is the power in us. Become part of the team and bring your uniqueness to us! We welcome all applications across different genders, origins, cultures, religions, sexual orientations, generations and disabilities. If there are any specific accommodations or adjustments you require for the interview process or your on-site appointment, please inform us, and we'll do our best to accommodate your requests.
Show more

Title: Senior ML Engineer
Description:
Company Description


We're an award-winning Google Cloud partner. We're the experts in transforming businesses and shaping the future of cloud technology. Join us and collaborate with top minds, build groundbreaking solutions, and make a real difference for our clients. Enjoy extensive professional development, global reach, and a supportive, Google-inspired culture. If you're passionate about the cloud, this is where you want to be.

With over 13 years of experience in Google Cloud under our belt, offices in 18 countries and more than 600 experts, we have deployed practical innovation alongside Google. We focus on infrastructure modernisation, data management, smart analytics, application modernisation, and AI & machine learning.

Curious about our projects? We got you: Check out our success stories


Job Description


Day-to-day life

Design, develop, and deploy cutting-edge machine learning models – crafting bespoke AI solutions for our Nordic clients.
Collaborate with data scientists, data engineers, and Google experts to overcome complex challenges and deliver impactful outcomes.
Champion knowledge sharing and mentorship, guiding junior colleagues in the art of machine learning and fostering a culture of continuous learning.
Stay at the forefront of Google Cloud AI/ML technologies, continuously expanding your expertise and exploring new possibilities.
Confidently present solutions to clients, bridging the gap between complex algorithms and real-world business value, while actively cultivating and expanding those customer relationships.



Want to know more? Check out our people stories on Youtube


Qualifications


We're seeking a passionate and experienced ML Engineer with a proven track record in designing, developing, and deploying machine learning models. You'll be a cloud enthusiast with a deep understanding of AI/ML principles and hands-on experience with cloud technologies. As a coding expert, you'll possess strong Python skills and a solid foundation in machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, LangChain, LangGraph).



Excellent communication is essential – you'll build strong relationships with clients, translate their needs into innovative AI solutions, and present complex topics with clarity and confidence. You're a true collaborator, thriving in team environments where knowledge sharing and mutual support are paramount.

Fluency in both Swedish and English is required.


Additional Information


Why Choose Devoteam G Cloud?

Own the AI revolution: Dive into the exciting world of Generative AI and ML, playing a pivotal role in shaping projects around Google's groundbreaking Gemini foundation model.
Innovative Impact: Work on the forefront of cloud technology at a globally recognized leader in Google Cloud solutions.
Direct Google Connection: Collaborate closely with Google teams, shaping the future of cloud and AI.
Unleash Your Expertise: Thrive in a fast-paced environment where sharing knowledge and success is paramount.
End-to-End Impact: Drive complete business transformations, from strategy to implementation and beyond.
Accelerate Your Career: Grow within a Google-inspired culture, gaining specialisations and certifications.



"Partnering with Devoteam has been a highlight of our efforts at Google Cloud. Their dedication and expertise elevate every project we undertake together. It's truly a collaboration that delivers exceptional results." — Alexander Percivall, Senior Partner Engineer, Google Cloud Nordics, Stockholm, Sweden.

We do plenty of activities, like meet-ups, hackathons, and partnerships. Don’t lose any of them: follow us on LinkedIn

Benefits

Encouragement and support for training and certification, in the form of coaching from other team members, cost coverage, and financial incentives.
Challenging and rewarding assignments, many of which are end-to-end.
A hybrid work model as standard, with flexible working hours and location to support your work-life balance.
An international, diverse, and inclusive team.
A human-centric and value-based company culture.
Wellness grants for sports activities (5,000 SEK/year).
A modern office in central Stockholm.
Full provision of work tools.
A variety of social events.



Our culture is based on continuous learning and career development, supported by a genuine, inclusive, and expert team that really loves pizza.

 

Want to know more about life at Devoteam? Check our Instagram page

Ready to join an elite team? Apply for our Senior ML Engineer position and become part of something exceptional!

Is this not the right position for you? Don’t worry, we have plenty of opportunities! Check out our Career page

 

Show more

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
Jobba med AI på riktigt och få ovärderliga erfarenheter från några av Nordens mest välkända varumärken genom att bygga och implementera deras AI-lösningar.







Vill du vara med och accelerera nästa våg av AI?

Vi är ett företag som hjälper organisationer att bygga och implementera AI på riktigt. Med en stark efterfrågan från våra kunder så söker vi nu dig som vill jobba hands-on med den allra senaste tekniken, bidra till konkreta kundlösningar och samtidigt vara med och forma hur AI ska användas framåt. Hos oss får du jobba med välkända varumärken inom olika branscher, i projekt där innovation, tempo och kvalitet står i centrum.







Rollen

Du kommer att arbeta som ingenjör i skarpa kunduppdrag – med fokus på GenAI, moderna AI/ML-plattformar samt robust infrastruktur. Vi levererar inte bara det som efterfrågas, utan hjälper kunderna att tänka större och komma längre.

Här får du kombinera din tekniska erfarenhet med ett strategiskt perspektiv och vara en del av ett team som driver utveckling – inte bara följer den.







Placering:

Stockholm (med flexibilitet för distansarbete)







Vi söker dig som har:

Teknisk utbildning inom datateknik, datavetenskap eller liknande (BSc/MSc)




Erfarenhet av att arbeta i molnmiljöer (AWS, GCP, Azure)




God förståelse för CI/CD och infrastruktur som kod




Praktisk erfarenhet av att bygga och driftsätta AI




Intresse för – och gärna erfarenhet av – Generativ AI i verkliga tillämpningar




Minst ett par års erfarenhet från branschen







Vad du får hos oss:

Möjligheten att vara med och forma nästa generations AI-tjänster




Konkurrenskraftig lön




Frihet att styra din egen tid och arbetsplats




Tillgång till den senaste tekniken – och ett team som gillar att nörda ner sig




En arbetskultur som kombinerar kvalitet med nyfikenhet och tempo




P.S. Känner du någon som borde se detta? Tipsa gärna – vi är alltid öppna för fler starka profiler, och hittar vi flera rätt, utökar vi teamet.

Show more

Title: Researcher within drug development
Description:
The Department of Biochemistry and Biophysics is seeking a Researcher and Head of Unit with experience in drug development for placement at the Biochemical and Cellular Methods Unit, Science for Life Laboratory, Solna.

For more information about the activities at SciLifeLab DDD, please visit www.scilifelab.se/ and www.scilifelab.se/units/ddd-platform/.

More information about us, please visit: the Department of Biochemistry and Biophysics.

Read more

Project description

The Drug Discovery and Development Platform at Science for Life Laboratory (SciLifeLab DDD) is a national infrastructure for academic drug development with the mission to translate academic discoveries into drug candidates for further commercial development. The operation, which has been in place for ten years, has contributed to 15 new spin-off companies, four licensing to “big pharma,” and five candidates in clinical trials. The drug discovery platform has expanded to include over 50 employees at six Swedish universities who jointly support collaborative projects with external academic project owners. The “Biochemical and Cellular Assays” (BCA) unit is affiliated with the Department of Biochemistry and Biophysics at Stockholm University and located at the SciLifeLab campus in Solna. We are now seeking a new Researcher and Head of Unit (HoU) for the BCA unit, which currently consists of five people. The position is permanent and located at SciLifeLab, Karolinska Institutet campus in Solna.

Main responsibilities

As a Researcher and Head of Unit, you will be responsible for the overall planning for the development and use of molecular pharmacology, biochemical, and cellular assays to discover new small molecule and antibody-based prototype drugs. SciLifeLab DDD maintains a semi-industrial environment within the universities where validation of assays, development, and reporting of automated assays with appropriate throughput for the projects are important. Raw data is reported to web-based databases.

You will actively participate in the various programs and in the platform’s management team, as well as in the practical laboratory work within the unit. You will also actively participate, interact, and communicate knowledge regarding the facility’s function, analytical methods, and ensure that results are reported both orally and in writing to the platform’s project groups.

The unit consists, in addition to the HoU, of four employees with extensive scientific and practical experience in drug development within industry, academia, and at SciLifeLab DDD. You will also be responsible for maintaining a creative environment through supportive leadership and effectively managing the administrative tasks assigned to the group within SciLifeLab DDD.

Another important task for you is in collaboration with other units at SciLifeLab DDD, to develop the multidisciplinary activities by introducing and developing new molecular pharmacology methods to identify, for example, multifunctional proximity-inducing molecules with pharmacological properties.

Qualification requirements

Researchers are appointed primarily for purposes of research and must hold a Swedish doctoral degree or an equivalent degree from another country.

Assessment criteria

Requirements


PhD or equivalent in cell, molecular biology, or biochemistry, and previous experience from work in the biotechnology/pharmaceutical industry or a relevant academic research environment.
Previous experience in leadership roles (personnel and/or projects) in an academic or industrial environment with good references.
Proven ability to combine the role of a technical expert with the ability to lead an organization and personnel.
You are a collaborative, pragmatic person with a “can-do” attitude.
It is important that you are highly motivated with the ability to work well in a changing interdisciplinary environment and that you have a clear focus on results and quality.
Great emphasis will be placed on personal competence with proven ability to organize and lead personnel, flexibly manage multiple collaborative projects, and communicate with external stakeholders.
You are motivated to fully engage in research that is formally owned by others.
Practical experience in the development of biochemical methods, cell culture, and cellular assays for compound screening is a requirement.


Advantageous

In the appointment process, special attention will be given to research skills and experience with various plate-based assay methods and operation of robotic liquid handling equipment, as well as automation of assay methods, is highly advantageous. Experience with immunologically based techniques and experience with Excel, electronic lab notebook systems (ELN), database management, and LIMS.

About The Employment

This is a full-time, indefinite-term position with a six-month trial period.

Stockholm University applies individual salary setting. Start date is as soon as possible.

We offer

With us, you will experience the dynamic interaction between higher education and research that makes Stockholm University an exciting and creative environment. You will work in an international environment and get favourable conditions. The university is located in the National City Park with good transport links to the city.

Stockholm University strives to be a workplace free from discrimination and with equal opportunities for all.

Contact

Further information about the position can be obtained from the Director of SciLifeLab DDD, Prof. Per Arvidsson, Per.Arvidsson@scilifelab.se.

Application

Apply for the position at Stockholm University’s recruitment system. Attach a personal letter and CV as well as the attachments requested in the application form. It is the responsibility of the applicant to ensure that the application is complete in accordance with the instructions in the job advertisement, and that it is submitted before the deadline.

The instructions for applicants are available at: How to apply for a position.

Stockholm University contributes to the development of sustainable democratic society through knowledge, enlightenment and the pursuit of truth.
Show more

You will actively participate in the various programs and in the platform’s management team, as well as in the practical laboratory work within the unit. You will also actively participate, interact, and communicate knowledge regarding the facility’s function, analytical methods, and ensure that results are reported both orally and in writing to the platform’s project groups.

The unit consists, in addition to the HoU, of four employees with extensive scientific and practical experience in drug development within industry, academia, and at SciLifeLab DDD. You will also be responsible for maintaining a creative environment through supportive leadership and effectively managing the administrative tasks assigned to the group within SciLifeLab DDD.

Another important task for you is in collaboration with other units at SciLifeLab DDD, to develop the multidisciplinary activities by introducing and developing new molecular pharmacology methods to identify, for example, multifunctional proximity-inducing molecules with pharmacological properties.

Qualification requirements

Researchers are appointed primarily for purposes of research and must hold a Swedish doctoral degree or an equivalent degree from another country.

Assessment criteria

Requirements

  • PhD or equivalent in cell, molecular biology, or biochemistry, and previous experience from work in the biotechnology/pharmaceutical industry or a relevant academic research environment.
  • Previous experience in leadership roles (personnel and/or projects) in an academic or industrial environment with good references.
  • Proven ability to combine the role of a technical expert with the ability to lead an organization and personnel.
  • You are a collaborative, pragmatic person with a “can-do” attitude.
  • It is important that you are highly motivated with the ability to work well in a changing interdisciplinary environment and that you have a clear focus on results and quality.
  • Great emphasis will be placed on personal competence with proven ability to organize and lead personnel, flexibly manage multiple collaborative projects, and communicate with external stakeholders.
  • You are motivated to fully engage in research that is formally owned by others.
  • Practical experience in the development of biochemical methods, cell culture, and cellular assays for compound screening is a requirement.

Advantageous

In the appointment process, special attention will be given to research skills and experience with various plate-based assay methods and operation of robotic liquid handling equipment, as well as automation of assay methods, is highly advantageous. Experience with immunologically based techniques and experience with Excel, electronic lab notebook systems (ELN), database management, and LIMS.

About The Employment

This is a full-time, indefinite-term position with a six-month trial period.

Stockholm University applies individual salary setting. Start date is as soon as possible.

We offer

With us, you will experience the dynamic interaction between higher education and research that makes Stockholm University an exciting and creative environment. You will work in an international environment and get favourable conditions. The university is located in the National City Park with good transport links to the city.

Stockholm University strives to be a workplace free from discrimination and with equal opportunities for all.

Contact

Further information about the position can be obtained from the Director of SciLifeLab DDD, Prof. Per Arvidsson, Per.Arvidsson@scilifelab.se.

Application

Apply for the position at Stockholm University’s recruitment system. Attach a personal letter and CV as well as the attachments requested in the application form. It is the responsibility of the applicant to ensure that the application is complete in accordance with the instructions in the job advertisement, and that it is submitted before the deadline.

The instructions for applicants are available at: How to apply for a position.

Stockholm University contributes to the development of sustainable democratic society through knowledge, enlightenment and the pursuit of truth.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer & Data Engineer
Description:
Drivs du av att arbeta med data och utveckla lösningar som gör verklig skillnad? Hos Amendo Tech får du chansen att arbeta i framkant inom machine learning och data engineering för några av Sveriges mest spännande företag. Just nu söker vi drivna och lösningsorienterade specialister för kommande uppdrag inom bank och finans, detaljhandel, myndigheter, produktbolag och snabbväxande startups. Vi erbjuder unika möjligheter för dig som är redo för en ny, stimulerande utmaning.

Din kompetens & profil

Machine Learning Engineer

Vi söker dig som har gedigen erfarenhet av att bygga och implementera maskininlärningsmodeller och som trivs med att analysera stora mängder data för att skapa insikter och affärsvärde.

Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av ett eller flera av följande områden/verktyg:


Programmering: Stark kompetens inom Python, Java eller Scala.
ML-ramverk: Erfarenhet av verktyg som TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn eller Keras.
Modellutveckling: Kompetens inom modellträning, optimering och hyperparameter-tuning.
Prediktiv modellering: Erfarenhet av regression, klassificering, klustring och djupinlärning.
Databehandling: Vana vid dataförbehandling och analys, gärna med verktyg som Pandas, NumPy och Dask.
Molntjänster: Erfarenhet av ML-pipelines på AWS SageMaker, Azure ML eller Google Cloud AI.
MLOps: Erfarenhet av CI/CD-principer för ML och verktyg som MLflow, Kubeflow, eller TensorFlow Extended (TFX).
Analytisk förmåga: Förmåga att tolka och kommunicera resultat till både tekniska och icke-tekniska intressenter



Data Engineer

Vi söker även dig som är erfaren inom data engineering och kan bygga skalbara dataplattformar, pipelines och integrationer som möjliggör analys och avancerad datamodellering.

Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av ett eller flera av följande områden/verktyg:


Programmering och scripting: Erfarenhet av Python, Java, Scala, eller SQL.
Dataplattformar och pipelines: Kunskap om verktyg som Apache Spark, Apache Kafka, Airflow, eller DBT.
Molntjänster: Erfarenhet av att bygga och hantera dataflöden i molnmiljöer som AWS (Glue, Redshift), Azure (Data Factory, Synapse) eller Google Cloud (BigQuery, Dataflow).
Data Lakes och Data Warehouses: Erfarenhet av att arbeta med dataarkitektur och lagringslösningar för att hantera stora datamängder.
ETL/ELT-processer: Erfarenhet av att utveckla effektiva och robusta ETL/ELT-pipelines.
Big Data-ramverk: Kunskap inom hantering och bearbetning av stora datamängder med exempelvis Hadoop, Hive, eller Snowflake.
Versionshantering och samarbete: God förståelse för versionshantering i Git och vana att arbeta i agila team.
Data Governance och säkerhet: Förståelse för datahanteringsprinciper, GDPR och dataetik.



Du har en vilja, nyfikenhet och drivkraft att vilja skapa nytta hos kunden samt lära dig nytt. En problemlösare som inte är rädd för att ta initiativ och vågar utforska nya vägar och arbetssätt. Du har en förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i nya sammanhang och processer. Du får saker gjorda och ser kunskapsluckor som en möjlighet för personlig utveckling. Du är analytisk och har stor förståelse för vikten av service och kommunikation.

Som konsult kommer du att ställas inför en rad olika utmaningar, både från ett socialt och pragmatiskt perspektiv. Därför tror vi att du är öppen och ödmjuk för både förändring och för olikheter. Du har ett agilt sätt att möta problem och kan se dem från olika vinklar.

Om Amendo Tech

Amendo Tech är din heltäckande partner inom IT och tech. Som vår konsultkollega blir du en del av ett personligt bolag som lägger stor vikt vid kompetens, mångfald och innovation. Vi ser varje medarbetares unika perspektiv som en styrka, och vi erbjuder ett öppet klimat där vi stöttar dig att nå dina mål. Tillsammans bidrar vi till att forma en bättre framtid genom teknik och kreativitet.

Vi är ett expansivt bolag med stark lokal närvaro i Stockholm samt i sydvästra och norra Sverige. Följ Amendo Tech på Linkedin!

Amendo Tech är en del av Amendo Group som har arbetat med framtidens kompetens sedan 2001. I koncernen ingår även Amendo Bemanning & Rekrytering och Lagotto Executive Search & Interim. Tillsammans möter vi dig där du står, och tar dig dit du vill. Vi är din engagerade och trygga kompetenspartner.

Frågor och kontakt

Vid frågor eller funderingar om våra konsultuppdrag är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till Amendo Techs Kiara Bergqvist på kiara.bergqvist@amendotech.se eller Johanna Hallenberg på johanna.hallenberg@amendotech.se. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig, varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

Title: Open Apply - AI Developer
Description:
What We Offer: - A good working environment that promotes collaboration and innovation - A competitive salary based on your experience and expertise - Paid vacation days to ensure you have a healthy work-life balance - Comprehensive health benefits to support your well-beingFor more than 35 years, Maandag® has been at the forefront of empowering people and organisations. We not only help professionals get jobs, but also connect them with a future that matches their values, desires and ambitions. Because when people are truly in the right place, they can develop themselves, fulfil their dreams and go to work with fresh energy every day. The energy and power released in the process is a catalyst for growth for companies. We started in the Netherlands, but now we also help professionals and organisations in Belgium, Poland, Dubai and Sweden. Our extensive knowledge of different markets, coupled with our wide network, enables us to make perfect matches quickly. Are you passionate about leveraging artificial intelligence to solve complex problems and create innovative solutions? We’re always on the lookout for talented AI Developers to join our team. Whether you’re an experienced professional or just beginning your journey in AI, we welcome open applications from motivated individuals eager to work on cutting-edge projects with the latest technologies - whether you would like to work as a freelancer or consultant. As an AI Developer, you’ll design, develop, and deploy AI-driven solutions that empower organizations to automate processes, enhance decision-making, and deliver superior user experiences. Your role will involve working with large datasets, developing algorithms, and creating machine learning models tailored to solve specific challenges. You’ll collaborate with data scientists, engineers, and domain experts to deliver impactful results. Key responsibilities may include: - Designing and implementing machine learning models and algorithms - Building and deploying AI applications using frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch - Preprocessing and analyzing large datasets for training and testing - Developing natural language processing (NLP), computer vision, or recommendation systems - Collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver AI solutions - Optimizing AI models for performance, scalability, and accuracy

We’re looking for innovative and analytical minds with a passion for artificial intelligence. While specific requirements may vary by project, ideal candidates will have the following skillset and experience.


A degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Java
Experience with machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn
Knowledge of AI domains like NLP, computer vision, or reinforcement learning
Familiarity with big data tools such as Hadoop, Spark, or Databricks
Understanding of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS AI/ML, Azure AI, or Google AI)
Strong mathematical foundation in linear algebra, calculus, probability, and statistics
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work collaboratively
Good communication skills in English (knowledge of Swedish is a plus)

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
At Umain, we're not just creating software; we're crafting the future, one innovative project at a time. With our motto "Shape, Ship, Scale," we empower our team to not only envision the future but also play a pivotal role in building it. We're a dynamic team where you can shape the future, ship groundbreaking solutions, and scale your abilities in many different ways.

We're on the lookout for developers ready to join us in this journey, bringing passion, creativity, and dedication along with them. The role is ideal for engineers with demonstrable skills in AI as well as for software engineers who have recently transitioned to AI and ML expertise, and offers an opportunity to develop your craft whilst working closely with clients on delivering AI solutions to real-world challenges.

Job Summary

We are seeking an AI Engineer with a strong intuition for AI and a genuine enthusiasm in building robust, scalable solutions to power innovative digital experiences. The ideal candidate combines technical expertise with a deep enthusiasm for advancing AI capabilities.

What We Offer


A chance to work closely with global brands on a range of diverse and unique projects that explore and truly push the boundaries of what's possible.
A fun and fair work environment where you have the opportunity to expand your skills through unique challenges and fantastic colleagues.
A personal coach, and a setting where you can grow professionally and personally.
Being part of multidisciplinary teams, participating in agile teams, being an important player in a highly ambitious setting.


As an AI Engineer at Umain, your role will involve:


Assisting our clients in clarifying their questions and determining if using AI is a suitable solution for them
You understand the limitations of a model and how to address them within the product’s UX
Implementing AI-as-a-Service (e.g., OpenAI, Claude LLMs) in projects; you assess when these services are a good option and understand any potential limitations
Being familiar with pre-trained models and available datasets and the ability to apply them if existing AI services fall short for the use case at hand
Validating, deploying, monitoring, and maintaining built models, ensuring they can be used at scale
Developing and maintaining end-to-end data pipelines and machine learning workflows, optimizing for performance and reliability
Working with diverse, cross-functional teams on projects that deliver groundbreaking AI solutions for global brands


It’s a plus (not a requirement) if you have additional experience in:


PyTorch, Tensorflow
Transfer learning, few-shot learning, PEFT and LoRa
Multi-modal transformer models, RLHF


Who You Are

We Value Candidates Who Demonstrate


Great delivery skills: Proven capability to deliver AI solutions
Strong AI intuition: A deep understanding of AI concepts
Curiosity: Enthusiasm for emerging technologies, creativity in problem-solving, and an eagerness to learn in a rapidly evolving AI landscape
You're a developer with a passion for innovation and a knack for problem-solving.
You're eager to learn, grow, and take on new challenges.
You value collaboration, diversity, and the opportunity to make a significant impact.
You believe in the power of technology to shape the future.


Why Umain?

Career Framework: We believe in fairness and clarity, which is why we've established a transparent career framework to ensure equal pay and equal opportunities for all. Your growth and success are as important to us as they are to you. Together with your coach, you will build your own development plan and grow in your career.

Work-Life Balance: At Umain, diversity is our strength. We understand that life doesn’t pause when you walk into the office. That's why we've cultivated an environment that supports an excellent work-life balance. We welcome team members from all walks of life, recognizing the richness that different backgrounds, ages, and life stages bring to our team. We're committed to supporting each other, encouraging a healthy work-life balance that respects your needs, whether it's taking care of your family, your pets, or yourself.

Innovations and Learning: Technology is always evolving, bringing new challenges and opportunities for collaboration and learning. Our developers work closely with designers, analysts, testers and more to tackle these challenges head-on, sharing knowledge and growing together.

Skills Over Degrees: We’re more interested in what you can do than in the diplomas you hold. Talent, drive, and creativity are what count at Umain. Here, you’ll find opportunities to grow, learn, and excel in your career, regardless of your educational background. If you have the ambition and commitment to succeed, we have the environment and resources to support your journey.

Are you ready to SHAPE, SHIP, and SCALE with us?

If you're a developer who thrives on innovation, values a supportive and inclusive workplace, and is eager to make a tangible impact on the future, we’d love to hear from you. Let’s build something awesome together.

Umain is a digital product consultancy. We shape, ship and scale digital products at speed. Founded in Stockholm in 2001, we are a growing team of 100+ experts in digital product strategy, design, and technology.

We are a part of Eidra, a group of top-notch companies specializing in strategy, creativity, and engineering. As a collective we guide leaders in making meaningful and lasting change.
Show more

Are you ready to SHAPE, SHIP, and SCALE with us?

If you're a developer who thrives on innovation, values a supportive and inclusive workplace, and is eager to make a tangible impact on the future, we’d love to hear from you. Let’s build something awesome together.

Umain is a digital product consultancy. We shape, ship and scale digital products at speed. Founded in Stockholm in 2001, we are a growing team of 100+ experts in digital product strategy, design, and technology.

We are a part of Eidra, a group of top-notch companies specializing in strategy, creativity, and engineering. As a collective we guide leaders in making meaningful and lasting change.

Title: Founding Data Scientist / Engineer
Description:
About the Company

Zoometry is an AgTech startup on a mission to accelerate innovation in animal feed through data. We are developing the first end-to-end SaaS platform that centralizes, simplifies, and analyzes data from animal nutrition and health trials. Our north star is to empower our customers to develop more effective and sustainable health solutions, faster.




About the Role

As our Founding Data Scientist / Engineer (and our very first hire! 🙂), you will work directly with the founder on a wide range of topics to build Zoometry's foundations and execute our strategy. You will be at the heart of creating our platform and our data culture.




This will include

Building and managing Zoometry's data infrastructure (pipelines, databases, cloud)
Developing and implementing analyses and models (statistical, ML) to extract valuable insights from trial data
Organizing how we work with data (processes, technology choices, best practices)
Contributing to the product vision by bringing a data perspective
Transforming raw data into actionable value for our users via the platform
Collaborating closely with the founder on data and product strategy
And much more... (it's the startup adventure!)




Qualifications

First and foremost, you believe that technology and data can transform traditional industries like animal nutrition, and you are passionate about contributing to more effective and sustainable animal feed. This pivotal role within an early-stage startup is perfect for a Data Engineer with an entrepreneurial spirit who wants to make a major impact. You will enjoy this role if you are a fast thinker, thrive in ambiguity and rapid change, and enjoy pushing the boundaries of your comfort zone.




You will also need to

Have solid technical expertise in Data Engineering and interest in Data Science (Python/R, SQL, Cloud platforms, ETL, Stats/ML)
Possess a solution-oriented, autonomous, and proactive mindset
Have a strong interest in the animal nutrition/health or AgTech domain – this would be a fantastic plus
Embrace a positive, growth-oriented mindset ("infinite mindset")




Logistics & Diversity

The role can be based in Stockholm or remote (with a preference for France). We strongly believe that diverse teams perform better, so we would be thrilled if you bring a unique perspective that broadens ours




How to apply

Please send your CV and a cover letter explaining your interest in Zoometry and why you believe you are the ideal candidate for this founding role to zoometry.tech@gmail.com Highlight your relevant experience in Data Engineering and Data Science, your entrepreneurial spirit, and ideally, your interest in our industry.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer - Stockholm
Description:
Professional Galaxy looking for a ML engineer for one of our clients in Stockholm for below job:

Develop AI/ML software products including but not limited to explore large data set, try out new algorithms, feature engineering, test and evaluate model output, deploy the solution for production usage and scale out to the comprehensive fashion network of the company

Design, develop & maintain the large-scale data infrastructure required for the AI/ML projects.

Leverage on understanding of software architecture and software design patterns to write scalable, maintainable, well-designed, and future-proof code.

Develop solutions, components, services and frameworks to address common needs in AI/ML projects, like feature reuse, model traceability, A/B test, etc.

Required skills and experiences:


BSc or MSc degree in computer science, engineering or related field, or equivalent practical experience.
Have 4+ years of professional experience working in relevant role for a Machine Learning Engineer.
You love coding, and like applying software engineering practices to machine learning projects.
Have experience in developing software products that have been successfully deployed to production.
Have several years of coding experience in modern programming languages, and strong background in Python programming, i.e. 3+ years.
Have great experience with cloud technologies for ML development, preferably Google Cloud and also Vertex AI.
Have solid experience in MLOps practices, developing ML pipelines, and deploying ML applications to production.
Have a strong working knowledge of a variety of AI/ML techniques and experience working with different frameworks.
Have experience handling high volume heterogeneous data (both batch and stream) and a solid understanding of data structures, databases, and data storage technologies.
Familiar with agile ways of working, team collaboration, data-driven development, reliable and responsible experimentation.


Deadline to submit: 20250505

Duration: 20250512 - 20251231

We recommend you to submit the application asap because position can be filled before the deadline.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
B3 Link, som är en del av B3-koncernen, är bland annat unika genom vår expertis inom AI-tillämpningar och förmåga att leverera projekt till våra kunder. Vi kombinerar teknik och affärsbehov, och tar ansvar för hela projektcykeln – från business case till implementering av AI-lösningar.

Om rollen

Nu söker vi dig som har erfarenhet inom maskininlärning! Att vara anställd på B3 Link innebär att du hjälper våra kunder i deras utvecklingsprojekt och dagliga utmaningar. Vi ser gärna att du har vana att arbeta såväl självständigt som kundnära och är van vid ett agilt teambaserat arbetssätt.

Vi letar efter dig som har:


Minst 5 års dokumenterad arbetserfarenhet inom maskininlärning eller liknande område
Erfarenhet av att utveckla och implementera maskininlärningsmodeller
Gedigen erfarenhet inom minst ett programmeringsspråk (te.x. Python, Scala eller R)
Erfarenhet av SQL och databashantering
Erfarenhet av dataanalys- och visualiseringsverktyg så som Pandas, Matplotlib
Kunskap om maskininlärningsbibliotek som TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn
Behärskar god svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


Vad vi erbjuder:

Att vi trivs tillsammans på B3 Link är otroligt viktigt. Anledningen till att många börjar hos oss är bland annat det stora fokuset på kompetensutveckling, där vi kontinuerligt delar kunskap med varandra och uppmuntrar till kompetensutveckling och certifieringar. Vi erbjuder bland annat:


Generös kompetensutveckling
Attraktiv lönemodell
En fantastisk wellness- och medarbetarsatsning


Om B3

B3 Link är en del av B3-koncernen. B3 är en börsnoterad koncern och trygg arbetsgivare med hög medarbetarnöjdhet. B3 har ca 1000 medarbetare inom många olika expertområden. B3 är rankad som Sveriges tredje bästa arbetsplats 2021 av Great Place to Work, utsett till Sveriges IT Karriärföretag 2022 och 2023, samt vann utmärkelsen Årets Karriärföretag 2022. Vi lever efter våra värdeord erfarenhet, olikheter och energi samt satsar på hållbarhet i alla led. Vi tror att medarbetare som mår bra presterar bättre och har därför B3 Team som anordnar aktiviteter inom wellness, från yoga och löpning till musikquiz och föreläsningar om stresshantering och mental hälsa.

Varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag!

Har du frågor om tjänsten? Tveka inte att kontakta rekryteringsansvarig, Lidia, för denna tjänst på lidia.hagos@b3.se.
Show more
